name: Fire Elemental Myrmidon
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons
languages: Ignan, one language of its creator's choice

special_abilities.name: Illumination.
descriptions: The myrmidon sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in a 40-foot radius.

special_abilities.name: Magic Weapons.
descriptions: The myrmidon's weapon attacks are magical.

special_abilities.name: Water Susceptibility.
descriptions: For every 5 feet the myrmidon moves in water, it takes 2 (1d4) cold damage.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The myrmidon makes three scimitar attacks.

actions.name: Scimitar.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Fiery Strikes (Recharge 6).
descriptions: The myrmidon uses Multiattack. Each attack that hits deals an extra 5 (1d10) fire damage.
